snippet: The regulator contends AOV Adult Movie Channel, AOV XXX Action Clips and AOV Maleflixxx have not ensured that 35 percent of their programming is Canadian, as required.
abstract: Canada's broadcasting regulator contends AOV Adult Movie Channel, AOV XXX Action Clips and AOV Maleflixxx have not ensured that 35 percent of their programming is Canadian, as required by its rules mandating minimum levels of domestic content; has scheduled broadcasting license review for three pornographic cable channels.
lead_paragraph: The regulator contends AOV Adult Movie Channel, AOV XXX Action Clips and AOV Maleflixxx have not ensured that 35 percent of their programming is Canadian, as required.

headline.main: Canada Challenges Erotic TV on Level of Domestic Content
headline.print_headline: Canada Challenges Erotic TV on Level of Domestic Content
